item.title: Financial Systems Database Administrator (financial district)
item.description:
Cooley Godward Kronish LLP, a premier national law firm that excels in high-stakes and complex matters, is seeking a Financial Systems Database Administrator in its San Francisco office. The DBA will be primarily responsible for creating, managing, maintaining, modifying and programming various relational databases and associated applications where appropriate for Financial Services/Accounting and related systems. The Financial Systems DBA will also serve as backup to the Business Information Systems (BIS) Database Administrator for the BIS System. Thorough understanding of relational databases, programming languages and the fundamentals of desktop and network operating systems is required. Four-year college degree and significant experience in supporting users and various software applications is preferred. EOE.

To apply, please go to www.cooley.com and navigate to the Careers section. Or, you may access the Careers page via the following link. http://www.cooley.com/careers/job_postings.aspx?sectionid=000000047003&jobtype=549&careerid=0
